title: Planescape Torment GOG
description:
== About the game:
Sigil... A place with gates that lead anywhere in existence, provided you have the proper key. It is a neutral ground and a watering hole for races across the multiverse, all under the watchful shadow of the Lady of Pain, the enigmatic ruler of the city. It is a place where the word is mightier than the sword, where thought defines reality, where belief has the power to reshape worlds and change the laws of physics...
But there's a lot more out there than just Sigil. Get outside the city and there's the planes themselves: the throne of the gods, the battleground of the eternal Blood War, and home to more horrors and wonders than ever existed on any Prime Material World. There's enough crusades, exploits, treasures and mysteries to keep a band of adventurers busy for centuries to come.
Anyways, all it takes is the right door, so step right through!

The main question in Planescape: Torment is "What could change the nature of a man?"


== Features:
Ã‚Â¤ An enthralling story, considered by many to be the best one ever told in a cRPG!
Ã‚Â¤ Professional voice acting, superb music, complex and gripping dialogue that covers over 5 000 pages.
Ã‚Â¤ Travel through the planes of the enormous and bizarre Planescape universe.


== Version: exe v1.0.0.1 or GOG setup v2.0.0.8 


== Instructions:
1. It's a GOG version, just launch setup
2. Click options to chose location and accept EULA, install 

3. Modding  
Follow this guide http://www.gog.com/news/mod_spotlight_planescape_torment_mods_guide or read Instructions in "mods" folder (all mods included in this torrent are the newest as of today)
Play - Enjoy - Seed - give me what I need
Speed! Yeah!


== System requirements:Minimum:
1 GHz Processor
3d graphics card with DX7
256 MB RAM 
Win Xp 32
DirectX 7
2.5 GB disk space

Recommended:
1.4 GHz Processor (higher resolutions will require a bit more)
3d card with DX9
512 MB RAM 
Win xp, 7, 8
DirectX 9
2.5 GB disk space


== Important notes:
Updated my journal.
